tool.name: @BINARY@
tool.description: compute pairwise correlations between multiple Hi-C contact matrices

param.name: pca
param.label: Eigenvector file
param.help: A PCA vector as a bedgraph file with no header. In case of several matrices with different conditions, ie. control treatment, the PCA of control can be used. Note that only one PCA can be provided.

param.name: quantile
param.label: Quantile
param.help: The number of to be used quantiles.

param.name: outliers
param.label: Outliers
param.help: The number of outliers to be removed.

validator.message: Only numeric characters and the a space as seperator are allowed.

data.name: output_matrix
data.label: Output .npz file includes all the generated matrices

tool.help:
Comparmentalization ===================
